name: Adidas GMR
tagline: Google Jacquard Smart Insole for FIFA Mobile

companies.name: EPAM Systems
companies.description: Primary employer and rescue team provider

description.short: Smart insole with Google Jacquard technology tracking real-world soccer performance for FIFA Mobile rewards.
description.full: Adidas GMR was a smart insole system developed in collaboration between Adidas, Google (Jacquard technology), and EA Sports. It tracked real-world soccer performance and converted it into rewards in EA SPORTS FIFA Mobile game. The product featured shot power measurement, distance & speed tracking, kick detection, FIFA Mobile integration, global leaderboards, and universal fit compatibility with any footwear.

howItWorked.title: Hardware
howItWorked.description: Small Google Jacquard Tag inserted into specially designed insole (dominant foot)

howItWorked.title: Tracking
howItWorked.description: Machine learning algorithms detected kicks, shot power, distance, speed, and passes

howItWorked.title: Syncing
howItWorked.description: Data transferred via Bluetooth to Adidas GMR app

howItWorked.title: Gaming
howItWorked.description: App connected to FIFA Mobile to unlock rewards and improve Ultimate Team OVR rating

challenge.context: Initial contractor (Intive) failed to deliver release on time.
challenge.response: EPAM team assembled in one week and sent to Adidas headquarters in Herzogenaurach, Germany.
details: Team assembled in one week
Sent to Adidas headquarters in Germany
Worked closely with Adidas and Intive teams on-site
Fixed critical issues and delivered release on time

achievements.title: Bluetooth Tag Emulator
achievements.problem: QA testing required physical data collection - kicking a football ball hundreds of times daily to generate test data.
achievements.solution: Built custom Bluetooth Tag emulator that could upload pre-recorded sessions, simulating real Jacquard tag data.
details: Created emulator that simulates real Jacquard tag data
Enabled uploading pre-recorded sessions
Removed physical hardware dependency for testing
Enabled rapid iteration cycles

achievements.title: Google Jacquard SDK Integration
achievements.problem: Complex Bluetooth SDK integration for Jacquard tag communication.
achievements.solution: Improved BLE protocol integration with Jacquard SDK and ML data interpretation.
details: BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) protocol implementation fixes
Machine learning data interpretation (empty data, not valid data)
Real-time sync with mobile app
Tag state management (connected, charging, active)

achievements.title: Rescue Mission Success
achievements.problem: Project was failing under initial contractor with missed deadlines.
achievements.solution: EPAM team rapidly assembled and deployed to rescue the project.
details: Rapid team assembly (1 week)
On-site work at Adidas HQ in Germany
Cross-team collaboration with Intive
Delivered working release on time

achievements.title: Stakeholder Buy-in
achievements.problem: Needed approval from multiple enterprise stakeholders for emulator approach.
achievements.solution: Presented and convinced Google, Adidas, and EA stakeholders in high-level meetings.
details: Participated in high-level meetings with Google, Adidas, and EA
Presented technical approach for Tag Emulator
Secured buy-in from all stakeholders
Influenced technical architecture decisions
